name: Kitterly, Inc.
description: Operator of a craft supplies marketplace intended to offer knitting and crochet kits. The company's marketplace offers a wide range of yarns, buttons, ring markers, and needles, enabling consumers to purchase crochet items seamlessly.
one_liner: Operator of a craft supplies marketplace intended to offer knitting and crochet kits. The company's marketplace offers a wide range of yarns, buttons, ring markers, and needles, enabling consumers to purchase crochet items seamlessly.
